group_format_priority.title: group_format_priority
group_format_priority.description: Control which format for ELTs is used for loss severity sampling when there are multiple formats available per output set. `M` = mean, `Q` = quantile, `S` = sample. `['M']` means only MELTs will be used for loss sampling. `['Q', 'M']` means that QELT will ber prioritised, falling back to MELT if QELT format is missing.
